bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Application for Monitoring Equipment to Liquid-Immersed Transformers and Components
IEEE Guide for Application for Monitoring Equipment to Liquid-Immersed Transformers and Components

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Identification of the key parameters that can be monitored for obtaining an indication of the condition of liquid-immersed transformers is covered by this guide. It also covers risk/benefit analysis, sensor application, and monitoring systems application. This guide does not cover interpretation of monitoring results.

Identification of the key parameters that can be monitored for obtaining an indication of the condition of liquid-immersed transformers is covered by this guide. It also covers risk/benefit analysis, sensor application, and monitoring systems application. This guide does not cover interpretation of monitoring results.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
